description: query information schema to make sure datasource is joinable and broadcast

query.query: SELECT TABLE_NAME, IS_JOINABLE, IS_BROADCAST FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = '%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%' AND IS_JOINABLE = 'YES' AND IS_BROADCAST = 'YES' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'druid'

description: query information schema to make sure druid schema is refreshed

query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = '%%JOIN_DATASOURCE%%'
